main event: On July 25, 1965, witnesses observed three round objects described as half balls of fire in Heidelberg, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The objects were observed at high altitude and moved silently,The objects had a much brighter light than any known jet,Witnesses included Master Sergeant John S. Frazier and Staff Sergeant Robert L. Steward,The sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds,The object disappeared immediately upon entering a cloud.
sighted object: three round objects emitting bright orange glow
witness description: Master Sergeant John S. Frazier and Staff Sergeant Robert L. Steward, both USAF members.
